description_for_human: Verifiable AI safety classifier for OpenClaw skills. Get safety classifications with optional cryptographic SNARK proofs.
description_for_model: SkillGuard evaluates the safety of OpenClaw skills using a ZKML classifier. Send a skill's metadata and scripts to get a safety classification (SAFE, CAUTION, DANGEROUS, MALICIOUS) with confidence scores. Optionally request a cryptographic SNARK proof. Use /api/v1/evaluate for full skill data, /api/v1/evaluate/name to look up by name, or /api/v1/evaluate/prove for classification with ZK proof. Payment: Bearer API key for full results, or x402 USDC on Base for basic results.
